players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: " I think we should focus on finding the killer, not pointing fingers at each other. We need to work together to uncover the truth."
Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, and I'm sad he's gone. We need to find out who did this."
Charlie: "I think we should investigate Diana, she was acting suspiciously last night."
Diana: "I think we should focus on finding the killer, not pointing fingers at each other. We need to work together to uncover truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
